name: qd
description:
C++/Fortran-90 double-double and quad-double package. With modifications
for easier integration with NJet. see http://crd-
legacy.lbl.gov/~dhbailey/mpdist/ for authors page

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependent_to.name: vasp
dependent_to.description:
The Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package (VASP) is a computer program
for atomic scale materials modelling, e.g. electronic structure
calculations and quantum-mechanical molecular dynamics, from first
principles.

dependent_to.name: njet
dependent_to.description:
NJet is a library for multi-parton one-loop matrix elements in massless
QCD.
